phrases: I've had acid reflux since I was around 12, but it has gotten worse over the past few years.

It feels burning in my chest and also in my throat.
burning... in my chest and also in my throat

intestines were twisted... surgery when I was around one month old

Upper endoscopy (EGD) to look for ulcers or precancerous conditions.
look for potential causes of GERD... precancerous or cancerous conditions
